name: Gnash and Spookz
description:
Gnash and his ghost pal Spookz are on their way to their good friend Victoria's research laboratory; she's been working on a special fizzy soda pop that even the undead can enjoy. Before they arrive however, the evil lich Grand Magus Vladula, who wants this fizzy pop for himself,  smashes up Victoria's research lab and kidnaps her! It's up to Gnash and Spookz to fight enemies, pick up collectables, and adventure through Castle Vladula in order to defeat Vladula and save their friend!

Design:

Travis Bragg

Eric Ocampo

James Ostrander

Mitchell Kraus

Yaimee Martinez

Art:

Jarrod Brown

Audio:
